Action.body: writing 1000 transactions with load test => 101,000 txns on all nodes, 100,990 on added node => 1000 transactions more => 102,000 transactions on all nodes, 101,990 on the added node. So, most probably this behavior resulted by current stability issues, not by "manual catch-up". *General notes:* "Manual catch-up" for 100,000 txns ledger happens instantly, when usual catch-up takes about 16 minutes for this size. >
